steps.name: A new default customer with $0.00 balance is created and logged in API

elements.name: PA Feed: Create Horse Racing Event

steps.name: I feed "PA" RabbitMQ with Event message based on "feeds/pa-hr-chester.json"
WagerPlayer receives the Event in "Horse Racing"-"CHESTER"
A new default customer with $0.00 balance is created and logged in API

elements.name: PA Feed: Create Greyhound Racing Event

steps.name: I feed "PA" RabbitMQ with Event message based on "feeds/pa-gh-hove.json"
WagerPlayer receives the Event in "Greyhound Racing"-"HOVE"
A new default customer with $0.00 balance is created and logged in API

elements.name: WIFT Feed: Create Horse Racing Event

steps.name: I feed "WIFT" RabbitMQ with Event message based on "feeds/wift-hr-bendigo.json"
WagerPlayer receives the Event in "Horse Racing"-"BENDIGO"
A new default customer with $0.00 balance is created and logged in API
I feed Gearman with Event message based on "feeds/gearman-football-npl-women-vic.json"
WagerPlayer receives the Event in "Football"-"NPL Women - Victoria"
the received Event status is "held"
A new default customer with $100.00 balance is created and logged in API
I login with valid username and password
homepage is displayed
I login with invalid username and password
I see "Invalid user" message
A new default customer with $100.00 balance is created and logged in API
I am logged into WP UI and on Home Page

elements.name: Single Win Bet: Horse Racing | Luxbook DVP Fixed | Punter Win

steps.name: I enter specifics category "Horse Racing" and subcategory "WOLVERHAMPTON"
I create a default Racing event with details
I enable "Luxbook DVP Fixed" product settings
I update fixed win prices "4.20, 4.10"
I place a single Racing "Win" bet on the runner "Runner01" for $2.50
customer balance after bet is decreased by $2.50
I result/settle created event race with winners "Runner01, Runner02"
customer balance since last bet is increased by $10.50
A new default customer with $100.00 balance is created and logged in API
I am logged into WP UI and on Home Page

elements.name: Single Win Bet: Horse Racing | Luxbook DVP Fixed | Punter Loss

steps.name: I enter specifics category "Horse Racing" and subcategory "WOLVERHAMPTON"
I create a default Racing event with details
I enable "Luxbook DVP Fixed" product settings
I update fixed win prices "4.20, 4.10"
I place a single Racing "Win" bet on the runner "Runner02" for $3.00
customer balance after bet is decreased by $3.00
I result/settle created event race with winners "Runner01, Runner02"
customer balance since last bet is increased by $0.00
A new default customer with $100.00 balance is created and logged in API
I am logged into WP UI and on Home Page

elements.name: Single EachWay Bet: Horse Racing | Luxbook DVP Fixed | Punter Win finishing 1st

steps.name: I enter specifics category "Horse Racing" and subcategory "WOLVERHAMPTON"
I create a default Racing event with details
I enable "Luxbook DVP Fixed" product settings
I enter market details
I update fixed win prices "10.00, 8.00, 7.00" and place prices "3.25, 2.75, 2.25"
I place a single Racing "EachWay" bet on the runner "Runner01" for $2.50
customer balance after bet is decreased by $5.00
I result/settle created event race with winners "Runner01, Runner02, Runner03"
customer balance since last bet is increased by $33.13
I am logged into WP UI and on Home Page

elements.name: Create Event: Horse Racing | WOLVERHAMPTON | 8 runners

steps.name: I enter specifics category "Horse Racing" and subcategory "WOLVERHAMPTON"
I see New Event page is loaded
I enter event details with 8 runners, current 'show time' and 'event date/time' in 30 minutes with data
I see Create Market page
I can see success status with message "Event Created"
I enter random prices for racing event matching 8 participants
I can see success status with message "Market Created"
I update race number to "1"
I enable "Luxbook DVP Fixed" product settings
I enable "SP" product settings
I enable "Forecast Fixed" product settings
I enable "Tricast SP" product settings
I enter market details
I can see success status with message "Market display updated"
event status is "L"

name: Create Sunbets Events in WagerPlayer UI

steps.name: A new default customer with $100.00 balance is created and logged in API
I am logged into WP UI and on Home Page
I enter specifics category "Horse Racing" and subcategory "WOLVERHAMPTON"
I create a default Racing event with details

cells: Runner01, Runner02, Runner03, Runner04, Runner05, Runner06, Runner07, Runner08

steps.name: I enable "Forecast SP" product settings
I place an exotic "Exotic" bet on the runners "Runner01, Runner02" for $2.00
customer balance after bet is decreased by $2.00
I result event with winners "Runner01, Runner02"
I settle race with Exotic prices "5.20"
customer balance since last bet is increased by $10.40

name: Placing and Settling Exotic Bets for a Single Event

steps.name: A new default customer with $100.00 balance is created and logged in API
I am logged into WP UI and on Home Page
I enter specifics category "Horse Racing" and subcategory "WOLVERHAMPTON"
I create a default Racing event with details
I enable "Luxbook DVP Fixed" product settings
I place a single Racing "Win" bet on the runner "Runner01" for $5.50
I place a single Racing "Win" bet on the runner "Runner01" for $3.50
I place a single Racing "Eachway" bet on the runner "Runner02" for $5.50
I place a single Racing "Eachway" bet on the runner "Runner03" for $2.50
customer balance after bet is decreased by $25.00
I result race with the runners and positions
I settle race
customer balance since last bet is increased by $9.90

name: Placing and Settling several Single bets on the same event

steps.name: A new default customer with $100.00 balance is created and logged in API
I am logged into WP UI and on Home Page

elements.name: Multi bet with 2 events Horse Racing  <Multitype>

steps.name: I enter specifics category "Horse Racing" and subcategory "WOLVERHAMPTON"
I create a default Racing event with details

cells: Runner01, Runner02, Runner03, Runner04, Runner05, Runner06, Runner07, Runner08

steps.name: I enable "Luxbook DVP Fixed" product settings
I enter market details
I enter specifics category "Horse Racing" and subcategory "WOLVERHAMPTON"
I create a default Racing event with details

cells: Runner11, Runner12, Runner13, Runner14, Runner15, Runner16, Runner17, Runner18

steps.name: I enable "Luxbook DVP Fixed" product settings
I place a Redbook Multi Bet "Double" "Win" on the runners "Runner01, Runner11" for $3.00
customer balance after bet is decreased by $3.00
I result/settle created event race with winners "Runner01, Runner02, Runner03"
I result/settle created event race with winners "Runner11, Runner12, Runner13"
customer balance since last bet is increased by $7.59
